## Portfolio class

Portfolio is a convenience class that automatically creates Album class instances for all subdirectories of a provided path.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export declare class Portfolio 
```

## Constructors

<table><thead><tr><th>

Constructor


</th><th>

Modifiers


</th><th>

Description


</th></tr></thead>
<tbody><tr><td>

[(constructor)(path, opts)](./photo-dir-to-json.portfolio._constructor_.md)


</td><td>


</td><td>

Instantiate all subdirectories of the provided path as Albums. This processes all subdirectories except `opts.metadataDir`<!-- -->, if provided.


</td></tr>
</tbody></table>
